Once activated, your breath weapon can't be used again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. Your breath weapon has the trait corresponding to the type of damage it deals.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of dragon you choose:

  • Mirage

    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d12 piercing plus 2d6 mental;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3d10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, @Damage[10d6[mental]]

Heightened (8th) Your battle form is Huge, you gain a +20-foot status bonus to your fly Speed, and your attacks have 10-foot reach (or 15-foot reach if they previously had 10-foot reach). You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +28, a damage bonus of +12, Athletics +28, and a +14 status bonus to breath weapon damage (@Damage[(6d10+14)[mental]] damage).

Spell Effect: Dragon Form (Omen).name: Efeito de Magia: Forma de Dragão (Agouro)
Spell Effect: Dragon Form (Omen).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form}

You transform into a Large dragon battle form. While in this form, you gain the dragon trait. You have hands in this battle form and can take manipulate actions. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Speed 40 feet, fly Speed 100 feet.
  • Resistance 10 against the damage type of your breath weapon (see below).
  • Darkvision and imprecise scent 60 feet.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +22, and your damage bonus is +6. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead. See below for more on these attacks.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.
  • Breath Weapon 2 (mental, occult) The shape, damage, and damage type of your breath weapon depend on your specific dragon form (see below). A creature in the area attempts a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save against your spell DC. This is a Reflex save unless stated otherwise in the special ability description for your specific dragon form. Once activated, your breath weapon can't be used again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. Your breath weapon has the trait corresponding to the type of damage it deals.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of dragon you choose:

  • Omen

    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d12 piercing plus 2d6 mental;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3d10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, @Damage[10d6[mental]]

Heightened (8th) Your battle form is Huge, you gain a +20-foot status bonus to your fly Speed, and your attacks have 10-foot reach (or 15-foot reach if they previously had 10-foot reach). You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +28, a damage bonus of +12, Athletics +28, and a +14 status bonus to breath weapon damage (@Damage[(6d10+14)[mental]] damage).

Spell Effect: Dragon Wings.name: Spell Effect: Dragon Wings
Spell Effect: Dragon Wings.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HWJODX2zPg5cg34F]{Dragon Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 60 feet, whichever is greater.

Spell Effect: Draw Ire.name: Efeito de Magia: Atrair Ira
Spell Effect: Draw Ire.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jsWthW1Qy6tg3SwD]{Draw Ire}

O alvo sofre uma penalidade de status -1 em jogadas de ataque contra criaturas que não sejam você. Em uma falha crítica, a penalidade é -2.

Spell Effect: Draw Ire (Success).name: Efeito de Magia: Atrair Ira (Sucesso)
Spell Effect: Draw Ire (Success).description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jsWthW1Qy6tg3SwD]{Draw Ire}

A criatura sofre uma penalidade de status -1 em jogadas de ataque contra criaturas que não sejam você. A magia termina no final do próximo turno do alvo.

Spell Effect: Draw the Lightning.name: Efeito de Magia: Atrair o Raio
Spell Effect: Draw the Lightning.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.n7OgbKme4hNwxVwQ]{Draw the Lightning}

Seu primeiro Golpe a cada rodada com a arma que você segurou no alto (ou com seus ataques desarmados se você segurou uma mão vazia no alto) causa dano de eletricidade adicional.

Spell Effect: Dread Ambience.name: Efeito de Magia: Ambiente Aterrorizante
Spell Effect: Dread Ambience.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1QMjWGq1DPOQr4VL]{Dread Ambience}

You take a status penalty to saving throws against fear effects.

Spell Effect: Dutiful Challenge.name: Efeito de Magia: Desafio Cumpridor
Spell Effect: Dutiful Challenge.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.caehfpQz7yp9yNzz]{Dutiful Challenge}

Você sofre uma penalidade de status -1 em jogadas de ataque, jogadas de dano e testes de perícia contra criaturas que não sejam a criatura marcada.

Spell Effect: Earthquake (Shaking Ground.name: Efeito de Magia: Terremoto (Solo Tremendo)
Spell Effect: Earthquake (Shaking Ground.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.x7SPrsRxGb2Vy2nu]{Earthquake}

Criaturas no solo tremendo sofrem uma penalidade de circunstância -2 em jogadas de ataque, CA e testes de perícia.

Spell Effect: Eat Fire.name: Efeito de Magia: Comer Fogo
Spell Effect: Eat Fire.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FWuLUKIbkJZjBiuA]{Eat Fire}

You gain resistance to fire damage.

Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Air).name: Efeito de Magia: Elemento Encarnado (Ar)
Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Air).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vQMAdnIwnV9prPiG]{Element Embodied}

You transform into a Gargantuan elemental battle form. While in this form, you gain the elemental trait and the air trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based if you choose an air or fire elemental, or Strength based if you choose an earth or water elemental. (This distinction doesn't change the statistics, but matters for the enfeebled and clumsy conditions, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +36 for air or fire elemental or Athletics modifier of +36 for earth or water elemental, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • Air Elemental fly Speed 80 feet;

    • High Winds (air, aura) 30 feet. Air within the emanation is difficult terrain for flying creatures that don't have the air trait;
    • Swiftness Your movement doesn't trigger reactions;
    • Melee 1 gust (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d12+11 bludgeoning plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.t6cx9FOODmeZQNYl]{Push} 10 feet;
    • Ranged 1 lightning lash (range increment 80 feet), Damage 3d12+4 electricity.

Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Earth).name: Efeito de Magia: Elemento Encarnado (Terra)
Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Earth).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vQMAdnIwnV9prPiG]{Element Embodied}

You transform into a Gargantuan elemental battle form. While in this form, you gain the elemental trait and the earth trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based if you choose an air or fire elemental, or Strength based if you choose an earth or water elemental. (This distinction doesn't change the statistics, but matters for the enfeebled and clumsy conditions, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +36 for air or fire elemental or Athletics modifier of +36 for earth or water elemental, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • Earth Elemental 30 feet, burrow 20 feet; resistance 5 to physical;

    • Spike Stones (aura, earth) 30 feet. The area is difficult terrain and hazardous terrain. A creature without the earth trait that moves on the ground in the area takes @Damage[5[piercing]] damage for every square of that area it moves into;
    • Rocky Toughness You gain 40 temporary Hit Points when you choose this form instead of 30;
    • Melee 1 fist (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d12+15 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged 1 rock (range increment 40 feet), Damage 4d8+6 bludgeoning.

Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Fire).name: Efeito de Magia: Elemento Encarnado (Fogo)
Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Fire).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vQMAdnIwnV9prPiG]{Element Embodied}

You transform into a Gargantuan elemental battle form. While in this form, you gain the elemental trait and the fire trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based if you choose an air or fire elemental, or Strength based if you choose an earth or water elemental. (This distinction doesn't change the statistics, but matters for the enfeebled and clumsy conditions, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +36 for air or fire elemental or Athletics modifier of +36 for earth or water elemental, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • Fire Elemental 50 feet; immunity to fire; weakness to cold 10;

    • Intense Heat (aura, fire) 30 feet. A creature that enters the aura or starts its turn in the aura takes @Damage[5d6[fire]] damage with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save against your spell DC. A creature can take damage from the aura only once per round;
    • Melee 1 tendril (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d10+12 fire plus 2d6 persistent fire;
    • Ranged 1 fire mote (range increment 60 feet), Damage 4d8+6 bludgeoning.

Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Metal).name: Efeito de Magia: Elemento Encarnado (Metal)
Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Metal).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vQMAdnIwnV9prPiG]{Element Embodied}

You transform into a Gargantuan elemental battle form. While in this form, you gain the elemental trait and the metal trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based if you choose an air or fire elemental, or Strength based if you choose an earth or water elemental. (This distinction doesn't change the statistics, but matters for the enfeebled and clumsy conditions, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +36 for air or fire elemental or Athletics modifier of +36 for earth or water elemental, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • Metal Elemental 40 feet, fly 40 feet; resistance 10 to electricity;

    • Arcing Electricity (aura, electricity, metal) 30 feet. A creature that enters the aura or starts its turn in the aura takes @Damage[2d12[electricity]] damage with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC; a creature made of metal, with the metal trait, or wearing metal armor takes a –1 circumstance penalty on this save. A creature can take damage from the aura only once per round;
    • Melee 1 blade (reach 25 feet, versatile slashing), Damage 3d12+15 piercing;
    • Ranged 1 metal shard (range increment 40 feet, versatile slashing), Damage 4d8+6 piercing.

Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Water).name: Efeito de Magia: Elemento Encarnado (Água)
Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Water).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vQMAdnIwnV9prPiG]{Element Embodied}

You transform into a Gargantuan elemental battle form. While in this form, you gain the elemental trait and the water trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based if you choose an air or fire elemental, or Strength based if you choose an earth or water elemental. (This distinction doesn't change the statistics, but matters for the enfeebled and clumsy conditions, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +36 for air or fire elemental or Athletics modifier of +36 for earth or water elemental, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • Water Elemental 40 feet, swim 80 feet; resistance 10 to fire;

    • Vortex (aura, water) 30 feet. Water within the aura that is part of the same body of water you occupy is difficult terrain for Swimming creatures that don't have the water trait;
    • Melee 1 wave (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d12+18 bludgeoning plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.t6cx9FOODmeZQNYl]{Push} or Pull 10 feet;
    • Ranged 1 water spout (range increment 60 feet), Damage 4d8+6 bludgeoning.

Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Wood).name: Efeito de Magia: Elemento Encarnado (Madeira)
Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Wood).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vQMAdnIwnV9prPiG]{Element Embodied}

You transform into a Gargantuan elemental battle form. While in this form, you gain the elemental trait and the wood trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based if you choose an air or fire elemental, or Strength based if you choose an earth or water elemental. (This distinction doesn't change the statistics, but matters for the enfeebled and clumsy conditions, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +36 for air or fire elemental or Athletics modifier of +36 for earth or water elemental, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • Wood Elemental 30 feet, climb 35 feet; resistance 5 to physical; weakness to axes 10;

    • Lush Growth (aura, wood) 30 feet. Ground in the area is difficult terrain, and any time a creature in the area regains HP from a healing vitality effect, the aura grants a +5 status bonus to the healing;
    • Woody Toughness You gain 40 temporary Hit Points when you choose this form instead of 30;
    • Melee 1 branch (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d10+18 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged 1 seed (range increment 40 feet), Damage 4d8+6 bludgeoning.

Spell Effect: Elemental Absorption.name: Efeito de Magia: Absorção Elemental
Spell Effect: Elemental Absorption.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9TauMFkIsmvKJNzZ]{Elemental Absorption}

You gain resistance to damage dealt by effects with the chosen elemental trait.

Spell Effect: Elemental Betrayal.name: Efeito de Magia: Traição Elemental
Spell Effect: Elemental Betrayal.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.f9uqHnNBMU0774SF]{Elemental Betrayal}

Quando você Conjurar esta Magia, escolha ar, terra, metal, fogo, água ou madeira. O alvo ganha fraqueza para aquele traço.

Spell Effect: Elemental Form.name: Efeito de Magia: Forma Elemental
Spell Effect: Elemental Form.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1K6AYGisvo9gqdhs]{Elemental Form}

Você se transforma em uma forma de batalha elemental.

Spell Effect: Elemental Gift.name: Efeito de Magia: Presente Elemental
Spell Effect: Elemental Gift.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.e36Z2t6tLdW3RUzZ]{Elemental Gift}

Choose an element when you Cast the Spell. The target gains the benefit of that element as described below, and this spell gains that trait's element.

  • Air The target gains a +30-foot status bonus to its land Speed and gains a fly Speed equal to its land Speed without the status bonus.
  • Earth While on the ground, the target gets a +2 status bonus to Fortitude and Reflex saves against effects that would Shove or Trip it, and to saves against effects that would attempt to knock it prone.
  • Fire The target's melee unarmed Strikes and melee weapon Strikes deal 1d6 persistent fire damage on a hit.
  • Metal The target's Strikes using a metal weapon or an unarmed attack deal an additional 1d4 electricity damage on a hit and get a +1 status bonus to the attack roll if the target is made of metal or wearing metal armor.
  • Water The target takes on a watery sheen, gaining resistance 5 to fire and a swim Speed equal to its land Speed.
  • Wood The target gains a number of temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's rank, then gains half that number of temporary HP at the start of each of its turns.

Spell Effect: Elemental Motion.name: Efeito de Magia: Movimento Elemental
Spell Effect: Elemental Motion.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.B8aCUMCHCIMUCEVK]{Elemental Motion}

Você invoca seu elemento para impulsioná-lo, melhorando sua Velocidade dependendo do seu elemento.

  • Ar Você ganha uma Velocidade de voar.
  • Terra Você ganha uma Velocidade de escavar.
  • Fogo Você ganha uma Velocidade de voar.
  • Metal Você ganha uma Velocidade de escavar.
  • Água Você ganha uma Velocidade de nadar.
  • Madeira Você ganha uma Velocidade de escalar.

Spell Effect: Elephant Form.name: Efeito de Magia: Forma de Elefante
Spell Effect: Elephant Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zjYQyuBNT5VjV4mz]{Elephant Form}

You transform into a Large battle form, specifically that of a elephant or similar creature, such as a mammoth, mastodon, or anancus. This spell has the effects of dinosaur form, except you gain the following specific abilities instead of the form-specific abilities of dinosaur form.

  • Speed 40 feet;
  • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2d8 bludgeoning.
  • Melee 1 trunk (reach 10 feet), Effect grabbing trunk;
  • Melee 1 tusk (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d6 piercing.

Grabbing Trunk A creature up to two sizes smaller that's hit by your trunk is grabbed. If you succeed at your Grapple check against a creature grabbed by your trunk, you can reposition the creature to another space within your trunk's reach.

Heightened (5th) Your elephant form is Huge; your trunk and tusk attacks have 15-foot reach, and your foot attack has 10-foot reach. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +18, a damage bonus of +6, double the damage dice, and Athletics +21.

Heightened (7th) Your elephant form is Gargantuan; your trunk and tusk attacks have 20-foot reach, and your foot attack has 15-foot reach. Your AC is 21 + your level and you instead gain 25 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +25, a damage bonus of +15, double the damage dice, and Athletics +25.

Spell Effect: Embodiment of Battle.name: Efeito de Magia: Encarnação da Batalha
Spell Effect: Embodiment of Battle.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.X4On99Nti8gjWywG]{Embodiment of Battle}

Você ganha um bônus de status em jogadas de ataque e dano feitas com armas ou ataques desarmados e você ganha a reação Golpe Reativo; esta reação ganha o traço aparição. Você sofre uma penalidade de status -2 em seus modificadores de ataque de magia e seus DCs de magia.

Spell Effect: Embrace Nothingness.name: Efeito de Magia: Abraçar o Nada
Spell Effect: Embrace Nothingness.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mau1Olq58ECF0ZPi]{Embrace Nothingness}

Você ganha resistência a dano físico igual ao seu nível.

Spell Effect: Embrace the Pit.name: Efeito de Magia: Abraçar o Poço
Spell Effect: Embrace the Pit.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ilGsyGLGjjIPHbyP]{Embrace the Pit}

Você ganha resistência a dano de fogo, veneno e físico (exceto prata).

Spell Effect: Endure.name: Efeito de Magia: Resistir
Spell Effect: Endure.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4c1c6eNzU1PFGkAy]{Endure}

Você ganha Pontos de Vida temporários.

Spell Effect: Enduring Might.name: Efeito de Magia: Poder Persistente
Spell Effect: Enduring Might.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.eG1fBodYwolaXK98]{Enduring Might}

Você ganha resistência igual a 8 mais seu modificador de Força contra todo o dano do ataque ou efeito que o acionou.

Spell Effect: Energy Absorption.name: Efeito de Magia: Absorção de Energia
Spell Effect: Energy Absorption.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.LoBjvguamA12iyW0]{Energy Absorption}

Você ganha resistência a dano de ácido, frio, eletricidade ou fogo do efeito que o acionou (um tipo de sua escolha). A resistência se aplica apenas ao dano inicial do efeito que o acionou.

Spell Effect: Energy Aegis.name: Efeito de Magia: Égide de Energia
Spell Effect: Energy Aegis.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.m2xFMNyQiUKQDRaj]{Energy Aegis}

O alvo ganha resistência a dano de ácido, frio, eletricidade, fogo, força, sônico, vitalidade e vazio.

Spell Effect: Enlarge.name: Efeito de Magia: Aumentar
Spell Effect: Enlarge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}

You grow to size Large and are clumsy 1. Your reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny), and you gain a +2 status bonus to melee damage.

Heightened (4th) You grow to size Huge. The status bonus to melee damage is +4 and your reach increases by 10 feet (or 15 feet if you started out Tiny).

Heightened (6th) Choose either the 2nd-rank or 4th-rank version of this spell.

Spell Effect: Enlarge (Heightened 4th).name: Efeito de Magia: Aumentar (Aprimorado 4º)
Spell Effect: Enlarge (Heightened 4th).description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}

Fortalecido por poder mágico, o alvo cresce para o tamanho Colossal. Seu equipamento cresce com ele, mas retorna ao tamanho natural se removido. A criatura é desajeitada 1. Seu alcance aumenta em 10 pés (ou em 15 pés se ele começou Minúsculo) e ele ganha um bônus de status +4 para dano corpo a corpo. A Magia não tem efeito em uma criatura Colossal ou maior.

Spell Effect: Enlarge Companion.name: Efeito de Magia: Aumentar Companheiro
Spell Effect: Enlarge Companion.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8rj45fKzCFcB0fxs]{Enlarge Companion}

Você cresce para o tamanho Grande. Seu equipamento cresce junto com você, mas retorna ao tamanho natural se removido. Você fica desajeitado 1, seu alcance aumenta em 5 pés (ou em 10 pés se você começou Minúsculo) e você recebe um bônus de status +2 para dano corpo a corpo. Esta magia não tem efeito em uma criatura Grande ou maior.

Aprimorado (4º) Você cresce para o tamanho Enorme. O bônus de status para dano corpo a corpo é +4 e seu alcance aumenta em 10 pés (ou 15 pés se você começou Minúsculo). A magia não tem efeito em uma criatura Enorme ou maior.

Spell Effect: Entangling Flora.name: Efeito de Magia: Flora Enredante
Spell Effect: Entangling Flora.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{Entangling Flora}

A criatura sofre uma penalidade de circunstância de -10 pés em seus Deslocamentos.

Spell Effect: Entreat Spirit.name: Efeito de Magia: Suplicar ao Espírito
Spell Effect: Entreat Spirit.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Yph1UqZU8vMc9bJG]{Entreat Spirit}

Você recebe um bônus de status em uma perícia baseada em Inteligência, Sabedoria ou Carisma e em testes de resistência contra efeitos de maldição, morte, emoção e medo.

Spell Effect: Entropic Wheel.name: Efeito de Magia: Roda Entrópica
Spell Effect: Entropic Wheel.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.X4T5RlQBrdpmA35n]{Entropic Wheel}

When you Cast a Spell that deals fire damage, the target also takes cold damage equal to the number of motes in the entropic wheel. When you Cast a Spell that deals cold damage, the target also takes fire damage equal to the number of motes in the entropic wheel.

Spell Effect: Entwined Roots.name: Efeito de Magia: Raízes Entrelaçadas
Spell Effect: Entwined Roots.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VDK5cQ94BszDrMiJ]{Entwined Roots}

You gain resistance to bludgeoning and piercing damage.

Spell Effect: Envenom Companion.name: Efeito de Magia: Envenenar Companheiro
Spell Effect: Envenom Companion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gWmLT5SkA0qH2mNE]{Envenom Companion}

The first time each round you hit a creature with an unarmed Strike that deals piercing or slashing damage, that Strike deals an additional 1d8 poison damage. A creature that is damaged by this poison must attempt a Fortitude save. On a failure, it's also clumsy 1 for 1 round.

Heightened (+3) The poison damage increases by 1d8 and the clumsy value imposed on a failed save increases by 1.

Spell Effect: Euphoric Renewal.name: Efeito de Magia: Renovação Eufórica
Spell Effect: Euphoric Renewal.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mTpPZIJ2sdgusPP1]{Euphoric Renewal}

Você recebe um bônus de circunstância +1 em salvamentos e Pontos de Vida temporários.

Spell Effect: Everlight.name: Efeito de Magia: Luz Perpétua
Spell Effect: Everlight.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ynm8JIU3sc3qUMpa]{Everlight}

A gema que você toca brilha, espalhando luz forte em um raio de 20 pés (e luz fraca pelos próximos 20 pés).

Spell Effect: Evolution Surge.name: Efeito de Magia: Surto de Evolução
Spell Effect: Evolution Surge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lV8FkHZtzZu7Cy6j]{Evolution Surge}

Choose one of the following effects:

  • You gain low-light vision and darkvision.
  • You gain scent as an imprecise sense up to 30 feet.
  • You can breathe underwater and gain a swim Speed equal to your land Speed or 30 feet, whichever is less. If you are aquatic, you can breathe air and gain a land Speed equal your swim Speed or 30 feet, whichever is less. You gain the amphibious trait.
  • You gain a +20-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Heightened (3rd)

  • You become Large, instead of your previous size. This increases your reach to 10 feet but doesn't change any other statistics.
  • You gain a climb Speed equal to your land Speed.

Heightened (5th)

  • You become Huge, instead of your previous size. This has the same effects as the 3rd-rank option to become Large, except your reach increases to 15 feet.
  • You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Extract Poison.name: Efeito de Magia: Extrair Veneno
Spell Effect: Extract Poison.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.CLThxp8Qf43IQ3Sb]{Extract Poison}

You add 1d6 poison damage per level of the poison you counteracted to the chosen weapon's Strike damage.

Spell Effect: Face in the Crowd.name: Efeito de Magia: Rosto na Multidão
Spell Effect: Face in the Crowd.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yH13KXUK2x093NUv]{Face in the Crowd}

Você ganha um bônus de status +2 em testes de Enganação e Furtividade para passar despercebido na multidão e ignora terreno difícil causado pela multidão.

Spell Effect: Faerie Dust (Critical Fail.name: Efeito de Magia: Pó de Fada (Falha Crítica)
Spell Effect: Faerie Dust (Critical Fail.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IkS3lDGUpIOMug7v]{Faerie Dust}

A criatura sofre uma penalidade de status -1 em testes de Percepção e salvamentos de Vontade.

Spell Effect: Faerie Dust (Failure).name: Efeito de Magia: Pó de Fada (Falha)
Spell Effect: Faerie Dust (Failure).description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IkS3lDGUpIOMug7v]{Faerie Dust}

A criatura sofre uma penalidade de status -2 em testes de Percepção e salvamentos de Vontade.

Spell Effect: False Vitality.name: Efeito de Magia: Falsa Vitalidade
Spell Effect: False Vitality.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8ViwItUgwT4lOvvb]{False Vitality}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points.

Spell Effect: Ferrous Form.name: Efeito de Magia: Forma Férrea
Spell Effect: Ferrous Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.89Hj5QuqvcwVXcqj]{Ferrous Form}

You gain resistance to physical damage, except adamantine. You're immune to death effects, disease, drained, fatigued, healing, nonlethal attacks, paralyzed, poison, sickened, vitality, and void.

Your fist Strikes have a 1d10 damage die, and your metal spells deal one additional die of damage (of the same damage die and damage type the spell uses).

Spell Effect: Fey Form (Dryad).name: Efeito de Magia: Forma Feérica (Dríade)
Spell Effect: Fey Form (Dryad).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Qu4IThrk1wpONwjT]{Fey Form}

You transform into a Medium fey battle form. You gain the fey trait, have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points and weakness 5 to cold iron.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based. If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifiers of +16, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of fey:

  • Dryad The temporary HP gained increases to 30; Speed 25 feet; weakness 5 to fire;

    • Melee 1 branch, Damage 1d12+8 bludgeoning.

Spell Effect: Fey Form (Elananx).name: Efeito de Magia: Forma Feérica (Elananx)
Spell Effect: Fey Form (Elananx).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Qu4IThrk1wpONwjT]{Fey Form}

You transform into a Medium fey battle form. You gain the fey trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points and weakness 5 to cold iron.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based. If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifiers of +16, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of fey:

  • Elananx Speed 30 feet; resistance 5 to fire;

    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 1d6+8 piercing plus 1d6 fire;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 1d6 slashing.

Spell Effect: Fey Form (Naiad).name: Efeito de Magia: Forma Feérica (Náiade)
Spell Effect: Fey Form (Naiad).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Qu4IThrk1wpONwjT]{Fey Form}

You transform into a Medium fey battle form. While in this form, you gain the fey trait, have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points and weakness 5 to cold iron.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based. If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifiers of +16, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of fey:

  • Naiad Speed 25 feet, swim 25 feet; resistance 5 to fire;

    • Melee 1 aqueous fist (water) Damage 1d8+8 bludgeoning.

Spell Effect: Fey Form (Redcap).name: Efeito de Magia: Forma Feérica (Duende Vermelho)
Spell Effect: Fey Form (Redcap).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Qu4IThrk1wpONwjT]{Fey Form}

You transform into a Medium fey battle form. You gain the fey trait, have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points and weakness 5 to cold iron.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based. If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifiers of +16, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of fey:

  • Redcap Speed 40 feet; Size Small;

    • Melee 1 scythe (deadly d10, trip), Damage 1d10+8 slashing;
    • Melee 1 boot (agile, versatile B), Damage 1d6 piercing.

Spell Effect: Fey Form (Unicorn).name: Efeito de Magia: Forma Feérica (Unicórnio)
Spell Effect: Fey Form (Unicorn).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Qu4IThrk1wpONwjT]{Fey Form}

You transform into Large a fey battle form. You gain the fey trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points and weakness 5 to cold iron.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based. If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifiers of +16, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of fey:

  • Unicorn gain the beast trait in addition to fey; Speed 40 feet; resistance 5 to poison; Size Large;

    • Melee 1 horn, Damage 1d10+8 piercing plus 1 spirit;
    • Melee 1 hoof (agile), Damage 1d8 bludgeoning;
    • all Strikes have the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune.

Spell Effect: Fiery Body.name: Efeito de Magia: Corpo Flamejante
Spell Effect: Fiery Body.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XS7Wyh5YC0NWeWyB]{Fiery Body}

You gain fire immunity, resistance 10 to precision damage, and weakness 5 to cold and to water.

Your unarmed attacks deal an additional 1d4 fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).

In fire form, you have a fly Speed of 40 feet.

Heightened (9th) Your unarmed attacks deal an additional 2d4 fire damage, and you have a fly Speed of 60 feet.

Spell Effect: Fiery Body (9th Level).name: Efeito de Magia: Corpo Flamejante (9º Nível)
Spell Effect: Fiery Body (9th Level).description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XS7Wyh5YC0NWeWyB]{Fiery Body}

Você se torna chama viva, dando a você imunidade a fogo, resistência 10 a dano de precisão e fraqueza 5 a frio e água. Qualquer criatura que tocar em você ou causar dano a você com um ataque desarmado ou arma corpo a corpo sem alcance sofre @Damage[4d6[fire]] de dano. Seus ataques desarmados causam 2d4 de dano de fogo adicional e suas magias de fogo causam um dado adicional de dano de fogo (do mesmo dado de dano que a magia usa). Você pode lançar @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame} como uma magia inata; o lançamento é reduzido de 2 ações para 1. Na forma de fogo, você tem um Deslocamento de voo de 60 pés e não precisa respirar.

Spell Effect: Figment.name: Efeito de Magia: Imagem Ilusória
Spell Effect: Figment.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0zU8CPejjQFnhZFI]{Figment}

Você pode tentar Criar uma Diversão com a ilusão, ganhando um bônus de circunstância +2 no seu teste de Enganação.

Spell Effect: Fire Shield.name: Efeito de Magia: Escudo de Fogo
Spell Effect: Fire Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YrzBLPLd3r9m6t1p]{Fire Shield}

You gain resistance to cold damage. You can Raise a Shield with the fire shield as a normal shield to gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Spell Effect: Flame Barrier.name: Efeito de Magia: Barreira de Chamas
Spell Effect: Flame Barrier.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.y7Tusv3CieZktkkV]{Flame Barrier}

You gain fire resistance against the triggering effect.

Spell Effect: Flame Dancer.name: Efeito de Magia: Dançarino das Chamas
Spell Effect: Flame Dancer.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.p6ebe2PliRkGbmiV]{Flame Dancer}

Os Golpes desarmados do alvo causam dano de fogo adicional. Acertos críticos com esses Golpes também causam dano de fogo persistente.

Spell Effect: Flame Wisp.name: Efeito de Magia: Fogo Fátuo
Spell Effect: Flame Wisp.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3q9tBMWsWQKlXPPJ]{Flame Wisp}

Cada vez que você atingir uma criatura com um Golpe, você causa dano de fogo.

Spell Effect: Flashy Disappearance.name: Efeito de Magia: Desaparecimento Vistoso
Spell Effect: Flashy Disappearance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YgbYvkLvnWJ4WfEA]{Flashy Disappearance}

You become undetected to all creatures unless they can see invisible creatures. You Stride. At the end of your movement, if you have cover, greater cover, or concealment, attempt a Stealth check to Hide. You gain a +2 status bonus to this Stealth check. The invisibility then ends, and you either become observed or hidden to creatures as determined by your check to Hide, if you made one.

Spell Effect: Fleet Step.name: Efeito de Magia: Passo Veloz
Spell Effect: Fleet Step.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aEM2cttJ2eYcLssW]{Fleet Step}

Você ganha um bônus de status de +30 pés ao seu Deslocamento.

Spell Effect: Flicker.name: Efeito de Magia: Cintilar
Spell Effect: Flicker.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zR67Rt3UMHKC5evy]{Flicker}

You gain resistance to all damage, except force.

Spell Effect: Fly.name: Efeito de Magia: Voar
Spell Effect: Fly.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Spell Effect: Font of Serenity.name: Efeito de Magia: Fonte de Serenidade
Spell Effect: Font of Serenity.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yY1H5zhO5dHmD8lz]{Font of Serenity}.

Aliados dentro da área ganham um bônus de status em testes de resistência contra efeitos de emoção.

Spell Effect: Forbidding Ward.name: Efeito de Magia: Proteção Proibitiva
Spell Effect: Forbidding Ward.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.RA7VKcen3p56rVyZ]{Forbidding Ward}

Você ganha um bônus de status na Classe de Armadura e em testes de resistência contra ataques, magias e outros efeitos do inimigo alvo.

Spell Effect: Foresight.name: Efeito de Magia: Previsão
Spell Effect: Foresight.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qsNeG9KZpODSACMq]{Foresight}

You gain a +2 status bonus to initiative rolls and aren't off-guard against undetected creatures or when flanked.

Spell Effect: Forge (Critical Failure).name: Efeito de Magia: Forjar (Falha Crítica)
Spell Effect: Forge (Critical Failure).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FTR8m4qrhYzTRyrD]{Forge}

You gain weakness to physical damage.

Spell Effect: Fortify Summoning.name: Efeito de Magia: Fortificar Convocação
Spell Effect: Fortify Summoning.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.tWzxuJdbXqvskdIo]{Fortify Summoning}

O alvo ganha um bônus de status +1 em todos os testes e CDs (incluindo sua CA).

Spell Effect: Fortifying Brew.name: Efeito de Magia: Cerveja Fortificante
Spell Effect: Fortifying Brew.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yRf59eFtZ50cGlem]{Fortifying Brew}

You gain temporary Hit Points. On a critical success, you also gain a +2 status bonus to saves against diseases and poisons.

Spell Effect: Fortissimo Composition.name: Efeito de Magia: Composição Fortissíssimo
Spell Effect: Fortissimo Composition.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kF0rs9mCPvJGfAZE]{Fortissimo Composition}

Aumenta o bônus de status da composição para +2 (+3 em um sucesso crítico).

Spell Effect: Frenzied Revelry.name: Efeito de Magia: Celebração Frenética
Spell Effect: Frenzied Revelry.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fxRaWoeOGyi6THYH]{Frenzied Revelry}

Você ganha um bônus de status +1 em testes de resistência contra efeitos mentais enquanto estiver na área. Sempre que alguém se beneficiando deste bônus obtiver um sucesso crítico em um teste de resistência contra um efeito mental de um inimigo, sua folia aumenta, concedendo a ele um bônus de status +1 em rolagens de ataque e rolagens de dano.

Spell Effect: Frenzied Revelry (Critical.name: Efeito de Magia: Celebração Frenética (Crítico)
Spell Effect: Frenzied Revelry (Critical.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fxRaWoeOGyi6THYH]{Frenzied Revelry}

Você ganha um bônus de status +1 em rolagens de ataque e rolagens de dano.

Spell Effect: Frostbite.name: Efeito de Magia: Congelamento
Spell Effect: Frostbite.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IxhGEKl63R4QBvkj]{Frostbite}

O alvo ganha fraqueza a concussão igual ao nível da magia.

Spell Effect: Fungal Infestation.name: Efeito de Magia: Infestação Fúngica
Spell Effect: Fungal Infestation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3VxVbZqIRvpKkg3O]{Fungal Infestation}

You gain weakness to fire and weakness to slashing.

Spell Effect: Garden of Death (Critical.name: Efeito de Magia: Jardim da Morte (Sucesso Crítico)
Spell Effect: Garden of Death (Critical.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.nEXkk85BQu1cREa4]{Garden of Death}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Nature or Crafting checks to deal with the plants or animals, such as feeding them or harvesting poison from them.

Spell Effect: Garden of Healing.name: Efeito de Magia: Jardim da Cura
Spell Effect: Garden of Healing.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.w4M6Vqvq8k6MOFvj]{Garden of Healing}

Você ganha um bônus de circunstância +1 em salvamentos contra efeitos de emoção.

Spell Effect: Gecko Grip.name: Efeito de Magia: Aderência de Lagartixa
Spell Effect: Gecko Grip.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5KobTMrZeZxuXMgl]{Gecko Grip}

You gain a climb Speed equal to its Speed.

Spell Effect: Ghostly Shift.name: Efeito de Magia: Mudança Espectral
Spell Effect: Ghostly Shift.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.JqHAxsMUZ4Mr5bTr]{Ghostly Shift}

Você ganha resistência 2 a todos os danos (exceto força).

Aprimorado (+2) A resistência aumenta em 1.

Spell Effect: Ghostly Weapon.name: Efeito de Magia: Arma Espectral
Spell Effect: Ghostly Weapon.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.AMEu5zzLN7uCX645]{Ghostly Weapon}

A arma ganha os efeitos da runa de propriedade toque fantasmagórico e se torna mágica se ainda não for.

Spell Effect: Girzanje's March.name: Efeito de Magia: Marcha de Girzanje
Spell Effect: Girzanje's March.description:
Concedido por Marcha de Girzanje

Criaturas aliadas que podem ouvir e entender você ganham um bônus de status +1 em rolagens de ataque, salvamentos de Fortitude e salvamentos de Vontade contra efeitos mentais.

Aprimorado (7º) O bônus de status aumenta para +2.

Aprimorado (10º) O bônus de status aumenta para +3.

Spell Effect: Glass Form.name: Efeito de Magia: Forma de Vidro
Spell Effect: Glass Form.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3qz32XdiugYhsr32]{Glass Form}

O alvo ganha resistência a dano de ácido, frio, eletricidade e perfuração e fraqueza a dano sônico e de concussão.

Spell Effect: Glass Shield.name: Efeito de Magia: Escudo de Vidro
Spell Effect: Glass Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.cgfl9Qr46bKaA59e]{Glass Shield}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC. You can Shield Block with the glass shield.

Spell Effect: Glimpse Weakness.name: Efeito de Magia: Vislumbrar Fraqueza
Spell Effect: Glimpse Weakness.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.cNnHV97gPqxJ3Rrr]{Glimpse Weakness}

Você causa dano de precisão adicional igual a 1 + o nível desta magia e então a magia termina.

Spell Effect: Glutton's Jaws.name: Efeito de Magia: Mandíbulas do Glutão
Spell Effect: Glutton's Jaws.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SdXFiQ4Py8761sNO]{Glutton's Jaws}

Você ganha Pontos de Vida temporários.

Spell Effect: Goodberry.name: Efeito de Magia: Fruta da Bondade
Spell Effect: Goodberry.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vQuwLqtFFYt0K15N]{Cornucopia}.

Você está segurando uma ou mais frutas da bondade, que permanecem frescas pela duração da magia.

Você pode consumir uma ou mais frutas da bondade do mesmo lançamento com uma ação Interagir para recuperar 1d6+4 Pontos de Vida por fruta da bondade.

Spell Effect: Gravity Weapon.name: Efeito de Magia: Arma da Gravidade
Spell Effect: Gravity Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IWUe32Y5k2QFd7YQ]{Gravity Weapon}

On your first weapon Strike each round, you gain a status bonus to damage equal to twice the number of weapon damage dice.

Spell Effect: Gray Shadow.name: Efeito de Magia: Sombra Cinzenta
Spell Effect: Gray Shadow.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rTvNWcKNpOnGklGF]{Gray Shadow}

O Golpe de mão sombria da sombra maior causa 1d8 de dano de veneno adicional.

Spell Effect: Guidance.name: Efeito de Magia: Orientação
Spell Effect: Guidance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance}

You gain a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check you attempt. You choose which roll to use the bonus on before rolling.

Spell Effect: Guided Introspection.name: Efeito de Magia: Introspecção Guiada
Spell Effect: Guided Introspection.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.R569jdqpNry8m0TJ]{Guided Introspection}

Você ganha um bônus de status em testes de resistência contra emoção e medo.

Spell Effect: Hallowed Ground.name: Efeito de Magia: Solo Sagrado
Spell Effect: Hallowed Ground.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4bFxUA59xeq6Snhw]{Hallowed Ground}

Criaturas mortas-vivas têm fraqueza a dano de vitalidade enquanto estiverem na área.

Spell Effect: Hand of the Apprentice.name: Efeito de Magia: Mão do Aprendiz
Spell Effect: Hand of the Apprentice.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.bSDTWUIvgXkBaEv8]{Hand of the Apprentice}

Você causa o dano da arma como se tivesse acertado com um Golpe corpo a corpo, mas adicionando seu modificador de habilidade de conjuração ao dano, em vez de seu modificador de Força. Em um sucesso crítico, você causa dano em dobro e adiciona o efeito de especialização crítica da arma.

Spell Effect: Harrowing.name: Efeito de Magia: Angustiante
Spell Effect: Harrowing.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ofAQyLtLEGnOIs3N]{Harrowing}

Determine aleatoriamente um naipe de harrow. A criatura pode rolar novamente qualquer teste associado que acabou de fazer, ganhando um bônus de status +4 na nova rolagem se o ritual foi um sucesso crítico. Se o ritual foi uma falha, ele recebe uma penalidade de status de -4.

Spell Effect: Haste.name: Efeito de Magia: Acelerar
Spell Effect: Haste.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Haste}

You gain the quickened condition and can use the extra action each round only for Strike and Stride actions.

Spell Effect: Healer's Blessing.name: Efeito de Magia: Benção do Curandeiro
Spell Effect: Healer's Blessing.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rhJyqB9g3ziImQgM]{Healer's Blessing}

When you regain Hit Points from a healing vitality spell, you regain 2 additional Hit Points.

Spell Effect: Heroism.name: Efeito de Magia: Heroísmo
Spell Effect: Heroism.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KqvqNAfGIE5a9wSv]{Heroism}

You gain a status bonus to attack rolls, Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks.

Spell Effect: Hidden Mind.name: Efeito de Magia: Mente Oculta
Spell Effect: Hidden Mind.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.C2w3YfBKjIRS07DP]{Hidden Mind}

You gain a +4 status bonus to saves against mental effects.

Spell Effect: Hidebound.name: Efeito de Magia: Amarrado ao Couro
Spell Effect: Hidebound.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3TuGuGZqyOBmWp7N]{Hidebound}

You gain resistance to physical damage, except adamantine, until the beginning of its next turn.

Spell Effect: Hippocampus Retreat.name: Efeito de Magia: Retirada do Hipocampo
Spell Effect: Hippocampus Retreat.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wSK0wtn8iHShYT9y]{Hippocampus Retreat}

Se você já tem um Deslocamento de natação, você pode Nadar até seu Deslocamento com um bônus de circunstância de +10 pés. Você ganha um bônus de circunstância +2 em sua CA contra reações desencadeadas por este movimento.

Spell Effect: Hymn of Healing.name: Efeito de Magia: Hino de Cura
Spell Effect: Hymn of Healing.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gSUQlTDYoLDGAsCP]{Hymn of Healing}

You gain fast healing and temporary Hit Points.

Spell Effect: Hyperfocus.name: Efeito de Magia: Hiperfoco
Spell Effect: Hyperfocus.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XhgMx9WC6NfXd9RP]{Hyperfocus}.

O alvo ganha um bônus de status +1 em testes de Percepção feitos com qualquer um de seus sentidos precisos.

Spell Effect: Ill Omen.name: Efeito de Magia: Mau Presságio
Spell Effect: Ill Omen.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6ZIKB0151LUR19Rw]{Ill Omen}

When you attempt an attack roll or skill check, you must roll twice and use the worse result the first time on a Failure or throughout the duration if it was a Critical Failure.

Spell Effect: Illusory Disguise.name: Efeito de Magia: Disfarce Ilusório
Spell Effect: Illusory Disguise.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise}

O alvo recebe um bônus de status +4 em testes de Enganação para evitar que outros vejam através do disfarce e permite que o alvo adicione seu nível a tais testes de Enganação, mesmo se não for treinado.

Spell Effect: Imitate Fauna.name: Efeito de Magia: Imitar Fauna
Spell Effect: Imitate Fauna.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HkjeegDsA5Wq0hR2]{Imitate Fauna}

You gain a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to prevent other animals from seeing through their disguise

Spell Effect: Impeccable Flow.name: Efeito de Magia: Fluxo Impecável
Spell Effect: Impeccable Flow.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8VzbumNyMEdSzZSz]{Impeccable Flow}

Você ganha um bônus de status +1 em testes de Percepção, testes de resistência e testes de perícia. Se você falhar criticamente em qualquer teste enquanto estiver sob os efeitos desta magia, você terá uma penalidade de status -1 em todos os testes pelo restante da duração.

Spell Effect: Incendiary Ashes (Failure).name: Efeito de Magia: Cinzas Incendiárias (Falha)
Spell Effect: Incendiary Ashes (Failure).description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OTd17oXwJH9qb1cS]{Incendiary Ashes}

Você tem fraqueza a fogo.

Spell Effect: Incendiary Ashes (Success).name: Efeito de Magia: Cinzas Incendiárias (Sucesso)
Spell Effect: Incendiary Ashes (Success).description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OTd17oXwJH9qb1cS]{Incendiary Ashes}

Você tem fraqueza a fogo.

Spell Effect: Incendiary Aura.name: Efeito de Magia: Aura Incendiária
Spell Effect: Incendiary Aura.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.AspA30tzKCHFWRf0]{Incendiary Aura}

Cada vez que uma criatura dentro da emanação sofre dano de fogo, ela pega fogo, sofrendo @Damage[(ceil(@item.level/2)+1)d4[persistent,fire]] de dano.

Spell Effect: Infectious Enthusiasm.name: Efeito de Magia: Entusiasmo Contagiante
Spell Effect: Infectious Enthusiasm.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VACvA5VRbddjt5s9]{Infectious Enthusiasm}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your choice of attack rolls, Will saves, or Charisma-based skill checks.

Spell Effect: Infectious Melody (Critica.name: Spell Effect: Infectious Melody (Critical Failure)
Spell Effect: Infectious Melody (Critica.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mUz3wqbMQ5JQ06M5]{Infectious Melody}

You take a -2 status penalty on linguistic Intimidation checks.

Spell Effect: Infectious Melody (Failure.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mUz3wqbMQ5JQ06M5]{Infectious Melody}

You take a -2 status penalty on linguistic Intimidation checks.

Spell Effect: Infectious Melody (Success.name: Spell Effect: Infectious Melody (Success)
Spell Effect: Infectious Melody (Success.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mUz3wqbMQ5JQ06M5]{Infectious Melody}

You take a -2 status penalty on linguistic Intimidation checks.

Spell Effect: Infuse Vitality.name: Efeito de Magia: Infundir Vitalidade
Spell Effect: Infuse Vitality.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2iQKhCQBijhj5Rf3]{Infuse Vitality}

Your unarmed and weapon Strikes deal extra vitality damage.

Spell Effect: Inner Upheaval.name: Efeito de Magia: Perturbação Interior
Spell Effect: Inner Upheaval.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZL8NTvB22NeEWhVG]{Inner Upheaval}

Você ganha um bônus de status +1 em suas rolagens de ataque com os Golpes e os Golpes causam 1d6 de dano extra do tipo escolhido.

Aprimorado (+4) O dano extra aumenta em 1d6.

Spell Effect: Inscrutable Mask.name: Efeito de Magia: Máscara Inscrutable
Spell Effect: Inscrutable Mask.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YQWq1DZuLRk32M3h]{Inscrutable Mask}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Deception checks to Lie or Feint, Intimidation checks to Demoralize, and Stealth checks to Hide in areas of dim light or darkness.

Spell Effect: Insect Form (Ant).name: Efeito de Magia: Forma de Inseto (Formiga)
Spell Effect: Insect Form (Ant).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form}

You transform into a Medium animal battle form. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +13, and your damage bonus is +2. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +13, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Ant

    • Speed 30 feet, climb Speed 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 mandibles, Damage 2d6 bludgeoning.

Heightened (4th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +16, damage bonus +6, and Athletics +16.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge, and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +2 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Athletics +20.

Spell Effect: Insect Form (Beetle).name: Efeito de Magia: Forma de Inseto (Besouro)
Spell Effect: Insect Form (Beetle).description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form}

Você visualiza um inseto simples e se transforma em uma forma de batalha animal Média. Quando você lançar esta magia, escolha uma forma.

Você pode decidir o tipo específico de animal (como uma joaninha ou escaravelho para besouro), mas isso não tem efeito no Tamanho ou nas estatísticas da forma. Enquanto estiver nesta forma, você ganha o traço animal. Você pode Desfazer esta magia.

Você ganha as seguintes estatísticas e habilidades independentemente da forma de batalha que escolher:

  • CA = 18 + seu nível. Ignore a penalidade de teste e a redução de Deslocamento da sua armadura.
  • 10 Pontos de Vida temporários.
  • Visão em condições de pouca luz.
  • Um ou mais ataques específicos para a forma de batalha que você escolher, que são os únicos ataques com os quais você pode Golpear. Você é treinado com eles. Seu modificador de ataque é +13 e seu bônus de dano é +2. Esses ataques são baseados em Força (para fins da condição @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfraquecido}). Se o seu modificador de ataque desarmado for maior, você pode usá-lo.
  • Modificador de Atletismo de +13, a menos que o seu seja maior.

Você também ganha habilidades específicas com base na forma que você escolher:

  • Besouro
    • Deslocamento 25 pés;
    • Corpo a Corpo 1 mandíbulas, Dano 2d10 de concussão.

Aprimorado (4º) Sua forma de batalha é Grande e seus ataques têm alcance de 10 pés. Você deve ter espaço suficiente para se expandir ou a magia é perdida. Em vez disso, você ganha 15 PV temporários, modificador de ataque +16, bônus de dano +6 e Atletismo +16.

Aprimorado (5º) Sua forma de batalha é Enorme e seus ataques têm alcance de 15 pés. Você deve ter espaço suficiente para se expandir ou a magia é perdida. Em vez disso, você ganha 20 PV temporários, modificador de ataque +18, bônus de dano +2 e dados de dano em dobro (incluindo dano persistente) e Atletismo +20.

Spell Effect: Insect Form (Centipede).name: Efeito de Magia: Forma de Inseto (Centopéia)
Spell Effect: Insect Form (Centipede).description:

If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Centipede

    • Speed 25 feet, climb Speed 25 feet; darkvision;
    • Melee 1 mandibles, Damage 1d8 piercing plus 1d4 persistent poison.

Heightened (4th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +16, damage bonus +6, and Athletics +16.
